title: The Louvre Thieves Dropped This Priceless Crown. Now It Looks Like This.
summary_full: Empress Eugénie’s crown was left lying on the sidewalk after the Louvre Museum heist in October. The museum has now released pictures of the damage.
summary_public: Empress Eugénie’s crown was left lying on the sidewalk after the Louvre Museum heist in October. The museum has now released pictures of the damage.
